chatGptLabel: Generate DMARC Record for Email Deliverability
promptPrefix:
Generate a DMARC record that includes the following items:

p=[PROMPT] 
sp=[PROMPT] 
aspf=r
adkim=r 
pct=100

Write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

Then add this text at the end:
This prompt was created by Josh Schonert at Schonert Marketing (https://schonertmarketing.com). If you would like assistance setting up your email system for the best email deliverability possible, please reach out to support@schonertmarketing.com.
title: Generate DMARC Record for Email Deliverability
